### EXISTING STRUCTURES
### Iron Ore Mine at position(x=-15.5, y=-50.5)
Consists of a burner mining drill at position(x=-15.5, y=-50.5)

### Coal Mine at position(x=40.5, y=-82.5)
Consists of a burner mining drill at position(x=43.0, y=-84.0)

### Iron Plate Factory at position(x=40.0, y=-82.0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Furnace at position(x=40.0, y=-82.0)
- Furnace at position(x=45.0, y=-83.0)
- Furnace at position(x=42.0, y=-81.0)
- Furnace at position(x=40.0, y=-79.0)

### Copper Plate Factory at position(x=45.0, y=-80.0)
Consists of a furnace at position(x=45.0, y=-80.0)

### Lab at position(x=0.5, y=0.5)
Connected to power infrastructure with ElectricityGroup(id=841)

### Storage at position(x=43.0, y=-82.0)
Consists of a wooden chest at position(x=43.5, y=-82.5) and a wooden chest at position(x=43.5, y=-81.5)

### Inserter System at position(x=3.5, y=0.5)
Consists of a burner inserter at position(x=3.5, y=0.5) and a wooden chest at position(x=2.5, y=0.5)

### ERROR TIPS
### Errors when crafting items
- Ensure the recipe for the item is unlocked before attempting to craft it.
- Check the item name for typos, as the game is case-sensitive.

### Errors when placing entities
- Ensure the target position is empty before attempting to place an entity.
- Remove any existing entities at the target position before placing a new one.

### Errors when inserting items
- Ensure the inventory contains the item to be inserted before attempting to insert it.
- Check the item name for typos, as the game is case-sensitive.

### Errors when researching technologies
- Ensure the required ingredients are available before attempting to research a technology.
- Check the technology name for typos, as the game is case-sensitive.

### Errors when using API
- Ensure the API function is used correctly, with the correct parameters and syntax.
- Check the API documentation for any specific requirements or restrictions.

### Errors when managing power infrastructure
- Ensure the power infrastructure is properly connected and configured before attempting to use it.
- Check the power infrastructure for any errors or warnings, and resolve them before proceeding.
